pages.text: The $(mob)Baykok$() is a boss that does not spawn naturally in the $(thing)Overworld$(). Players must perform the $(thing)Totentanz Ceremony$() to summon it, after which It will immediately attack nearby players with rapidly fired arrow attacks.

$(mob)Baykoks$() drops the $(item)Baykok Bow$() on death. This bow is stronger and has a higher enchantability than a mundane $(item)Bow$(). Any arrows fired from this bow are only visible to the player who fires them.
